text: Gerta Lehmann (born 21 July 1979) is a Greek equestrian. She competed in the individual dressage event at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Greek female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Greece Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Cagnes-sur-Mer
title: Gerta Lehmann
